{{Quote|This letter detailing our infantry movements was meant for Lord Damon of House Marbrand. It was sent to Lord Marlin of House Dormund.|Tywin Lannister|The Old Gods and the New}}
'''Marlin Dormund''' is a [[Northman|northern]] lord and the head of House Dormund. He is a bannerman of [[House Stark]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there is no mention of any character named Marlin Dormund or House Dormund.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 2]]===
Due to Ser [[Amory Lorch]]'s nigh-illiteracy, a letter from [[Tywin Lannister]] to Lord [[Damon Marbrand]] is sent instead to Lord Marlin.<ref>"[[The Old Gods and the New]]"</ref>
